step_language_prompt: Please select the language you want to use.
step_welcome_lead: Ready to get started with Box?
step_welcome_footer: Remember: Use responsibly and according to the terms.

step_country_prompt: Click on the map to pick your country, then choose your timezone.
step_destination_prompt: Select the drive where you want to install Box. Make sure it has enough free space.
step_network_prompt: Select a network interface to configure or reuse current system settings.
step_network_wifi: Wireless interface detected: {interface}. Please select a network:
step_user_prompt: Set up the primary user account for Box.
step_installing_prompt: Please wait while setup installs Box on your computer.
